title: 2 Novels by Viktor Arnar Ingolfsson (Retail)
description:
2 Novels by Viktor Arnar Ingolfsson (Retail) AZW3, epub, mobi


Daybreak

When the shotgun-blasted body of a goose hunter is discovered, the police believe they have a list of suspects who may have wanted the victim dead, from his young wife to the caretaker of his property. But then a second body, another hunter, is found with a similar fatal wound. And then a third. As the pattern emergesÃ¢â‚¬â€all goose hunters, all shot at the break of dawnÃ¢â‚¬â€Reykjavik policemen Gunnar and Birkir face the terrifying possibility that a serial killer is stalking the idyllic Icelandic countryside.

Gunnar and Birkir set a trap for the one they call Ã¢â‚¬Å“the Gander,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ but it quickly becomes a wild goose chase as the murderer plays some tricks of his own. With the clock running out and the discovery of another body all but guaranteed, the cops must determine if there is a thread connecting the victims or if the killings are all part of a twisted game.

House of Evidence

On a cold January morning in 1973, inside a stately old house in Reykjavik, blood pools around Jacob Kieler Junior from a fatal gunshot wound to his chest. Detective JÃƒÂ³hann PÃƒÂ¡lsson, an expert in the emerging field of forensics, is called to the scene and soon discovers something more unsettling than the murder itself: the deceasedÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s father, Jacob Kieler Senior, a railroad engineer, was shot to death in the same living room nearly thirty years earlier. The case was officially closed as a botched robbery.

PÃƒÂ¡lsson soon uncovers diaries that portray Kieler Senior as an ambitious man dedicated to bringing the railroad to Iceland no matter the cost. Sensing a deeper and darker mystery afoot, the detective and his colleagues piece together through the elder KielerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s diaries a family history rich with deceitÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
